author: Charles Joly
description: I've reduced the quantities originally specified by a third for sobriety and added an optional splash of sugar syrup for balance.
name: Brotherhood
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
